availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Lafayette Scott (Maysville, Mason County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Maysville, Mason County, Kentucky, attorney. Married to Theresa Frank Scott in Mason County, Kentucky on September 3, 1857. Married to Sallie Chiles Scott in Mason County, Kentucky, November 30, 1859. Attorney in Mason County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 363.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 154A.
Find A Grave, "Col John L. Scott (1829-1903)," Memorial #15017815, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/15017815 (accessed June 10, 2019).
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Mason County Marriages, p. 18 of microfilm.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Mason County Marriages, p. 14 of mircrofilm
